description: Manages a V2 subscription resource within FlexibleEngine.

tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

Endpoint.description:
Message endpoint.
For an HTTP subscription, the endpoint starts with http\://.
For an HTTPS subscription, the endpoint starts with https\://.
For an email subscription, the endpoint is a mail address.
For an SMS message subscription, the endpoint is a phone number.

Owner.description: Project ID of the topic creator.

Protocol.description:
Protocol of the message endpoint. Currently, email,
sms, http, and https are supported.

Remark.description:
Remark information. The remarks must be a UTF-8-coded
character string containing 128 bytes.

Status.description:
Subscription status.
0 indicates that the subscription is not confirmed.
1 indicates that the subscription is confirmed.
3 indicates that the subscription is canceled.

SubscriptionUrn.description:
Resource identifier of a subscription, which
is unique.

TopicUrn.description: Resource identifier of a topic, which is unique.
